Name: Albert and Puzzle Mansion
About the game: Albert's cat has been abducted! Enter the mansion and solve puzzles in order to find and rescue the cat! This is a short and lighthearted puzzle game where you move blocks in a certain order to open the door to the next floor. Use your problem solving skills and make your way through the mansion! More puzzle mechanics appear as you traverse the mansion.
